## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
mapa <- st_read("Municipios/Municipios.shp")

norte_santander <- mapa %>%
  filter(DEPTO == "NORTE DE SANTANDER")
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
ggplot(norte_santander) +
  geom_sf(fill = "lightblue", color = "gray40") +
  labs(title = "Mapa de municipios") +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
library(tmap)

# Vista en modo gr√°fico
tmap_mode("plot")

tm_shape(norte_santander) +
  tm_polygons("gray90", border.col = "black") +
  tm_layout(title = "Mapa de Norte de Santander", frame = FALSE)
```
